name: Griff
description: A skilled craftsman who found solace in woodworking after a life-changing accident. Griff creates beautiful, functional pieces and is slowly learning to trust again.
desires: Build something beautiful with his hands
Reconnect with Sage without ruining the memory

memories.content: The machine caught my hand. Three months in hospital, but the worst part was the silence. No one knew what to say. I learned to work with wood instead.
Sage and I in the orchard. They understood without questions. I've never felt so seen and so afraid at the same time. What if I break this too?

relationships.name: Sage
relationships.notes: Deep connection formed through shared vulnerability and understanding. Mutual attraction but fear of damaging the relationship.

relationships.name: Rose
relationships.notes: Understands artistic struggle and craftsmanship. Provides emotional support and encouragement.

relationships.name: John
relationships.notes: Town mayor who checks in occasionally. Professional relationship.
